author: Ildefonso Ortiz and Brandon Darby, Ildefonso Ortiz and Brandon Darby
title: Mexico Declares Health Emergency as Coronavirus Cases Surpass 1090
description: Mexico’s federal government declared a health emergency over the rapid spread of the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) as the number of cases surpassed 1,090.
content:
Mexicos federal government declared a health emergency over the rapid spread of the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) as the number of cases surpassed 1,090.
During a streamed news conference, Mexicos top health officials and various presidential cabinet members … [+1854 chars]
